shortdesc.ph: Options for subscribing to remote video streams.

p.codeblock: public abstract int setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx( int uid, VideoSubscriptionOptions options, RtcConnection rtcConnection);
virtual int setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx(uid_t uid, const VideoSubscriptionOptions& options, const RtcConnection& connection) = 0;
public abstract int SetRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx(uint uid, VideoSubscriptionOptions options, RtcConnection connection);
Future<void> setRemoteVideoSubscriptionOptionsEx( {required int uid, required VideoSubscriptionOptions options, required RtcConnection connection});

section.title: Details
section.p: When a remote user has enabled dual-stream mode, you can call this method to choose the option for subscribing to the video streams sent by the remote user.
